resources.string: This contact includes information from multiple accounts. The contact will be deleted from your phone now and from the server after synchronisation.
No favourites. To add a contact to favourites, tap the star button in the contact detail screen.
Could not access remote voicemail server. Call the voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Could not downloaded audio file. Call the voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
There is a voicemail message waiting on the server but it could not be downloaded. Call the voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Could not retrieve voicemail message from server. Call the voicemail server directly to listen to the voicemail message.
Voicemail app configuration error. Please configure your voicemail app.

"Upgrading Contacts.
The upgrade process requires approximately %sMB of internal storage.
Choose one of the following options:"
This contact includes information from multiple accounts. The contact will be deleted from your device now and from server after synchronisation.
Type contact name before joining with another.
Join the current contact with the selected contact?
"Switch to editing the selected contact? Information that you've entered so far will be copied."
Contact widget added to Home screen.
Cannot add Myself or SIM contacts to favourites
Contacts linked. Show the following contact details in your contact list:
No contact in this group has any phone numbers
Delete all contacts on the SIM card. This will take a few minutes.
Contacts will be exported except for restricted contact information
Contacts will be sent as \"%s\" except for restricted information
No contacts available. You might have chosen restricted account data.
Favourites is a reserved name in the system. Use another name for your group.

ICE is an internationally widespread function for reaching relatives or friends in case of an emergency. It is intended for emergency personnel and will be found in the emergency dialler if the phone is locked.

In the ICE information, you can enter your medical status, such as allergies and medications you are using, and contact information for your closest relatives or friends. The ICE information can be accessed from the lock screen even if the phone is locked.
My name, picture and medical info are shown in ICE view
In the options menu, select to show name, picture and medical info in ICE view
Contact has been added to the list of ICE contacts
Contact has been cleared from the list of ICE contacts
Add favourites from your contacts to reach them quickly from this tab
The contacts you communicate with most are shown here
Enter a name or number using the keypad below to search for a contact

"No contacts are synced from the selected account.
Make sure that you sync online contacts from this account or return to the contact list and create contacts on this account. You can also create a group with contacts from another synced account."
"The owner of the device hasn't activated calling ICE contacts from this screen"
You have added the maximum number of favourites
"Contacts also provides a call log and call features. To activate the full functionality, tap Allow in the next permission request dialogue(s)."
To call phone numbers and read the call log
To sync with Calendar (your events in Calendar will not be sent to other apps or devices)
To use location (your location will not be sent to other apps or devices)
To call phone numbers and read the call log
To sync with Calendar (your events in Calendar will not be sent to other apps or devices)
To use location (your location will not be sent to other apps or devices)
